price: 62. (Muuse) wuxuu yidhi: Ma jirto. Waxaa ila jira Rabbigay, wuxuu i tusi jid aan ka baxo.
arabic: قَالَ كَلَّآۖ إِنَّ مَعِيَ رَبِّي سَيَهۡدِينِ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: qāla kallā inna maʿiya rabbī sayahdīni
